alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Douglas; Edgar; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 24 at 7:40PM CDT until April 24 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Southern Vermilion County in east central Illinois... Southeastern Champaign County in east central Illinois... Northeastern Douglas County in east central Illinois... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Homer to Newman, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Fairmount around 750 PM CDT. Sidell around 755 PM CDT. Catlin and Chrisman around 800 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Danville, Westville, Tilton, Ridge Farm, Belgium and Georgetown. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 213 and 220. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
